short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: An all-in-one content creation app that makes it fast, easy and fun to design and share social media posts, video, images, and more
short.de: Eine All-in-One-Anwendung für einfaches, schnelles Erstellen und Freigeben von Social-Media-Posts, Videos und Bildern mit Freude
short.fr: App de création de contenu complète : design et partage rapides, faciles et amusants de posts, vidéos, images, etc. sur les réseaux
short.ja: SNS 投稿、動画、画像などのデザインや共有を素早く、簡単に、楽しく行えるオールインワンのコンテンツ作成アプリ。
short.ko: 소셜 미디어 게시물, 비디오, 이미지 등을 빠르고 쉽고 재밌게 디자인하고 공유할 수 있는 올인원 콘텐츠 제작 앱

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Get access to Adobe Express from right inside Google Chrome. Make Reels and TikTok videos, social stories, social posts, flyers, resumes, banners, logos, and more. Generate extraordinary text effects and images instantly from just a description with generative AI, powered by Adobe Firefly. Complete projects faster with thousands of professionally designed templates, Adobe Stock photos, videos, music, and more. Combine video clips, artwork, animations, and music to make videos with drag-and-drop ease. Complete one-click tasks powered by Adobe photo, design, video, and PDF tools. Import PDF flyers and brochures to easily make creative edits like adding eye-catching text, images, brand logos and more. Collaborate and comment on files in real time with your team.
long.de,fr,ja,ko:
Adobe Express is an all-in-one content creation app that makes it fast, easy and fun to design and share artwork made with Adobe Firefly generative AI, standout social media posts, videos, images, PDFs, flyers, logos and more.

Get access to Adobe Express from right inside Google Chrome. Make Reels and TikTok videos, social stories, social posts, flyers, resumes, banners, logos, and more. Generate extraordinary text effects and images instantly from just a description with generative AI, powered by Adobe Firefly. Complete projects faster with thousands of professionally designed templates, Adobe Stock photos, videos, music, and more. Combine video clips, artwork, animations, and music to make videos with drag-and-drop ease. Complete one-click tasks powered by Adobe photo, design, video, and PDF tools. Import PDF flyers and brochures to easily make creative edits like adding eye-catching text, images, brand logos and more. Collaborate and comment on files in real time with your team.
